children.name: Joshua L (Lincoln, NE)
children.quote: An 'earthly' realignment with the source.

children.name: Janessa Wilder (Redding, CA)
children.quote: A felt sense of integrity and wholeness

children.name: Jignasha Pandya (India)
children.quote: Sitting by the ocean and watching the vastness of the sea.

children.name: Asha Brown
children.quote: My husband shared the practice with me when he did a 30-day pod within the ServiceSpace ecoysystem, and this introduction to it from him has been quite meaningful to my mental and physical health.

children.name: Fran Hopper
children.quote: I am 77 years old and have been quite tired for a long time. I want to develop more vitality so that I can live life more fully.

children.name: Trushna Mehta
children.quote: The ability to see ourselves through the eyes of someone who deeply loves us.

children.name: Zara
children.quote: Body, mind, and spirit fully connected and everything working smoothly.

children.name: Diana Stirling
children.quote: Gifts can be perilous. I don't feel I have the wisdom to choose a gift that would be appropriate for the entire world.

children.name: Bipasha M
children.quote: Transforming yourself and touching your true self

children.name: Annalena Vesper
children.quote: I want to be giving my time for just empowering, inspiring, ecological or/and change projects.

children.name: Doug Winger
children.quote: Healthy food, comfortable shelter, good paying jobs, kind community

children.name: Aashal Parikh (Ahmedabad, India)
children.quote: Would help heal people.

children.name: Alana McFarlane
children.quote: Desire to deepen my healing practice so that I can then contribute more to lived presence within community.

children.name: Alina Frank
children.quote: The ability to accept oneself completely

children.name: Amy Fabrikant
children.quote: Healing happens when we ground our body, center our mind, and open our heart to life's energy flow.

children.name: Ankur Verma
children.quote: freedom from suffering

children.name: Belinda Ko
children.quote: Respect for one another

children.name: Camille Reeves
children.quote: Restoration of the true self.

children.name: carol puchailo
children.quote: Healing requires a simple willingness to be OPEN to the possibilites & responsibilities for your own action.

children.name: Caroline Noble
children.quote: A reworking of our food system

children.name: Cecile
children.quote: Equity, true justice, peace, harmony and the knowledge that each person has the ability to heal and awaken.

children.name: Cynthia Riha (San Francisco)
children.quote: Ease and openness to the unknowable, ever-changing ground of experience.

children.name: Cynthia Sirois
children.quote: opening to greater possibilities

children.name: Dhruv Bhoot
children.quote: Visual story telling that triggers a shift in mindset and opens the heart.

children.name: Elizabeth Normand
children.quote: Personal connection with The One.

children.name: Ellen Cool
children.quote: I gift the world the freedom of light and love I know in my heart.  With no constraints we all would enjoy our garden of eden together in peace.

children.name: Galaxy Dancer (New Mexico)
children.quote: Aligning the wisdom of the heart with the physical body and with one's spiritual/eternal self.

children.name: George Loyer
children.quote: The integration of mind, body and spirit in living our best life.

children.name: Hana Kenny
children.quote: The opportunity to find your way back home to yourself.

children.name: Jan C (Lincoln, NE)
children.quote: Balm that removes fear and floats away pain and dread.

children.name: Jeanne Davis
children.quote: Divine Love and Peace

children.name: Jennifer Maki
children.quote: Complete surrender and sweet, flowing communion with the Divine.

children.name: Jennifer Wakefield (North Hollywood, CA)
children.quote: Making me the musician, healer and being in touch with my inner child and inner psychic 🔮.

children.name: Jeremy
children.quote: Learning to be more present and finding peace in that.

children.name: JoAnne A
children.quote: Your lifeforce energy is able to flow through your body and self-repair and you can find inner peace.

children.name: Joe Houska (Los Angeles, CA)
children.quote: Movement toward gratitude and compassion to ourself and all our relations, including loving "no's" to what does not serve life.

children.name: John Ingleby (UK)
children.quote: I am 80 years old and wish to practise a daily, quiet meditative way of being in touch with my body

children.name: Kate Milligan (Iowa)
children.quote: All beings, all realms, bathed in oneness, light, and love.

children.name: Kern Beare (Mountain View, CA)
children.quote: Healing is the process of becoming whole again; or of realizing one is already whole.

children.name: Kristin VK
children.quote: If the conditions are right, the body knows how to grow, heal, and die.

children.name: L Yee
children.quote: Reconnection to ancestral wisdom.

children.name: Lan Huang
children.quote: Nature, meditation, enjoying the sun, smiles, laughters, playing like a child, silence, noble friendships, sound of windchimes, music...

children.name: Michael Daole
children.quote: There is no separation anywhere. It is all my own self! The rocks and trees and sky and all people are in reality my own self. It is all god, or whatever name you want to give it. I experienced it all as one consciousness. As one love. Peaceful and eternal.

children.name: Nicolas Boillot
children.quote: Perception beyond the little self.

children.name: Roshni Shah
children.quote: giant hugs, hot tea, bright sunshine, belly-shaking laughter...

children.name: Wadude Laird
children.quote: Establishing flow, vitality and harmony at all levels of being until one knows him/herself as the emodiment of divinity.
